original_title: A Sour Tale Of Wrath In The West
overview: A disgruntled ex-soldier has tracked down his war-weary Confederate Captain from the Civil War, vengeful for his fallen comrades' deaths. What they don't know is that the Union are also interested in seeing Wyatt dead...
tagline: Vengeance drives one, money drives the other...
title: A Sour Tale Of Wrath In The West
